titles.title: A bill to provide that any individual who is the spouse of a Member of Congress shall be ineligible for any civilian office or position as to which appointment is required to be made by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 4/26/1988--Introduced. Prohibits any spouse of a Member of Congress from being eligible for any office or position for which appointment is required to be made by the President with the advice and consent of the Senate.
